metadata.description: The 4-issue sequel to the fan-favorite BATMAN/WILDCAT series finds both Wildcat and the Feline Fatale on the Las Vegas Strip! Selina Kyle heads out west to make a quick bundle testing the security of the Klondike Casino, but the owners have a shadier proposition in store for her. Ted Grant heads to the desert city to see a new heavyweight in action, but is soon donning the gloves against Catwoman. Meanwhile, a new contender, Clawhammer, looking to make a name for himself as a super-villain, enters the ring.
metadata.name: Catwoman/Wildcat
